#Text= Tenzin says : " I see the prince is becoming accustomed to the burdens of leadership .

column1: #Text=Have you received any word on the Avatar 's location ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Not yet , but I have airbenders all over the world on the lookout for her .
#Text=I 'm concerned about reports I 've heard regarding Kuvira 's growing military .
#Text=They say she 's throwing some of her dissenters into prison camps .
